channel.title: Changed Max Level, but
channel.description:
I changed this:
[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99; }[/code]
To this:
[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 119; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 119; }[/code]
But, not all skills are able to. For example, attack is 99/119 right now, and even when I keep using master command which raises XP, it stays 99, whats wrong?

item.title: Changed Max Level, but
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

You probably got the command with 14910000XP that’s not all XP to 119…

Read full topic

item.title: Changed Max Level, but
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

I changed this:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {          int points = 0;          int output = 0;          for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {         points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));         output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);         if (output >= exp) {             return lvl;         }          }          return 99;   }

To this:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {          int points = 0;          int output = 0;          for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 119; lvl++) {         points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));         output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);         if (output >= exp) {             return lvl;         }          }          return 119;   }

But, not all skills are able to. For example, attack is 99/119 right now, and even when I keep using master command which raises XP, it stays 99, whats wrong?

Read full topic
